txt.en: The fiery grims are nothing but a hindrance to the dwarf efforts, and their flames must be extinguished. Their hot orange glow should make them easy targets.

'I have seen these creatures moving throughout the Flaming Deeps, but do not know what they are. They appear almost as if the depths themselves have taken shape. There is a fell air about them. I fear they are an ancient evil, perhaps drawn here by Durin's Bane.\n\n'If you encounter these strange beings on your journey through the Flaming Deeps, do not hesitate to extinguish them! We dwarves have no love for them.'
'I fear the grims are an ancient evil, perhaps drawn here by Durin's Bane.'
You have extinguished the bright, roaming flames of the Fiery Grims that prowl the Flaming Deeps. The dwarves will rest easier knowing that their number is lessened.
The fiery grims are nothing but a hindrance to the dwarf efforts, and their flames must be extinguished. Their hot orange glow should make them easy targets.
Defeat fiery grims in the Flaming Deeps ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Fiery grims can be found throughout the Flaming Deeps.\n\nYou should extinguish the Fiery Grims, for the dwarves do not love them.
You have extinguished the bright, roaming flames of the Fiery Grims that prowl the Flaming Deeps. The dwarves will rest easier knowing that their number is lessened.
